name: Thrummren
description: The Thrummren is a massive celestial creature with a powerful presence, known for its chaotic good alignment and overwhelming abilities on the battlefield. Its physicality is accentuated by its high natural armor and significant hit points.
memorable: Its ability to absorb lightning damage and heal itself makes it a nearly invincible force against electrical attacks.
goals: To protect its rider and dominate the battlefield with thunderous force.
relations: It is often seen with a rider, enhancing its protective capabilities.
environment: Typically found in celestial or stormy areas, where it can engage in grand battles.
strengths: Immunities to lightning and poison, along with magical resistance and heavy damage potential through its attacks.
weaknesses: While resistant to several damage types, it may still be vulnerable to psychological effects or abilities that can bypass its high defenses.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack capabilities with mighty gore and hooves strikes, dealing both piercing and thunder damage.
most_powerful_ability: Lightning Absorption allows it to become stronger when hit by lightning attacks, healing instead of taking damage.
senses: The Thrummren has darkvision extending 120 feet, allowing it to perceive hidden threats effectively.
skills: Notable saving throw proficiencies in Dexterity, Wisdom, and Charisma enhance its resilience against various attacks.
additional_information: Can redirect attacks aimed at its rider with Protect Rider ability.
Storm Hide ability deals lightning damage to melee attackers.
Multiattack allows for both piercing and thunder damage in one round.
Highly mobile for its size with a substantial walk speed.
Serves both as an offensive powerhouse and a protector.
test_queries: massive celestial protector with thunder abilities
chaotic good celestial monster on the battlefield
